meta.title: Callastar - Connect with creators and experts for paid video calls
meta.description: Book video calls with creators, experts and influencers. Secure payments via Stripe, video calls via Daily.co. Monetize your time or get personalized advice.

hero.title: Connect with creators and experts
hero.subtitle: The platform that connects fans and creators for private video calls
hero.description: Callastar is a paid video call booking platform that allows users to connect directly with creators, experts and influencers for consultations, coaching or personalized advice.

about.title: What is Callastar?
about.description: Callastar is an innovative platform that connects users with content creators, experts and influencers for private paid video calls.

usedFor.title: What is Callastar used for?
usedFor.meetGreet: Virtual meet and greets with your favorite creators

users.title: For users
users.description: Get expert advice, personalized coaching or chat with your favorite creators

creators.title: For creators
creators.description: Monetize your time and expertise by offering video calls to your community

features.title: Key Features
features.description: Everything you need for professional video calls

booking.title: Easy Booking
booking.description: Simple and intuitive booking system. Choose your creator, select an offer and book in a few clicks.

payments.title: Secure Payments
payments.description: Secure transactions via Stripe. Complete protection of banking data and instant payments.

videoCalls.title: HD Video Calls
videoCalls.description: High-quality video calls via Daily.co. Stable and reliable connection for an optimal experience.

reviews.title: Reviews & Ratings
reviews.description: Transparent review system. Check other users' reviews before booking.

profiles.title: Creator Profiles
profiles.description: Detailed profiles with biography, rates and availability. Find the perfect creator for your needs.

offers.title: Custom Offers
offers.description: Creators offer different durations and rates. Choose the offer that suits you best.

journey.title: How does it work?
journey.description: Four simple steps to connect with creators

step1.title: 1. Discover
step1.description: Explore creator profiles and discover their video call offers

step2.title: 2. Sign up
step2.description: Create your account for free in seconds

step3.title: 3. Book
step3.description: Choose an offer, make a secure payment and confirm your booking

step4.title: 4. Connect
step4.description: Join your video call at the scheduled time and enjoy your conversation

users.title: Looking for expert advice?
users.description: Explore our creators and book your first call now

settings.title: Payout Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure the frequency and minimum amount for your payouts
settings.scheduleDailyDesc: Automatic payout every day if available balance reaches minimum
settings.scheduleWeeklyDesc: Automatic payout every Monday if available balance reaches minimum
settings.scheduleManualDesc: You must manually request each payout (subject to admin approval)
settings.minimumAmountDesc: Minimum amount required to trigger a payout (between 10 {currency} and 1,000,000 {currency})
settings.importantNote: Automatic payouts (daily/weekly) are processed automatically by the system. Manual payouts require administrator approval.
settings.syncedWithStripe: Synced with Stripe - Your settings are up to date on Stripe
settings.outOfSync: Out of sync - Settings differ between database and Stripe
settings.saveToSync: Save your settings to sync with Stripe.
settings.dailyDesc: The system checks daily if your available balance reaches the minimum amount. If yes, an automatic payout is created to your Stripe account.
settings.weeklyDesc: The system checks every Monday if your available balance reaches the minimum amount. If yes, an automatic payout is created to your Stripe account.
settings.manualDesc: You must manually request a payout from the payments page. Each request must be approved by an administrator before being processed. This gives you complete control over the schedule of your payouts.
settings.tipDesc: If you prefer to have a regular cash flow, choose "Daily" or "Weekly". If you prefer to manually control your payouts, choose "Manual".

settingsCard.title: Transfer settings
settingsCard.subtitle: Configure the frequency and minimum amount of your transfers

manual.title: Request a manual transfer
manual.body: You have {amount} {currency} available for a transfer.

historyCard.title: Transfer history
historyCard.subtitle: List of all your transfers and their status
historyCard.emptySubtitle: Transfers will appear here once processed

daily.title: Daily :
daily.body: Automatic transfer each day if the available balance reaches the configured minimum

weekly.title: Weekly :
weekly.body: Automatic transfer every Monday if the available balance reaches the configured minimum

manual.title: Manual :
manual.body: You must manually request each transfer (subject to admin approval)

processing.title: Processing times:
processing.body: Stripe transfers are typically processed within 2-3 business days. Once the transfer is processed by Stripe, the funds are sent to your bank account according to your Stripe settings (usually another 1-2 days).

bank.title: Banking configuration:
bank.bodyStart: To set up or change your bank account, log in to your

request.title: Request Manual Payout
request.subtitle: Submit a payout request for approval
request.currencyConversionDesc: Your Stripe account is in {currency}. The amount will be automatically converted from EUR (base) to {currency} during the transfer. The current conversion rate will be applied at the time of processing.
request.payoutsNotEnabled: Payouts are not enabled on your account. Please complete your payment setup.
request.balanceTooLow: Your available balance is lower than the required minimum ({minimum} {currency}). You cannot request a payout at this time.
request.payoutAmountDesc: Specify the amount you wish to receive
request.importantNote: This request will be reviewed by an administrator before being processed. You will be notified once the request is approved or rejected.
request.cannotRequest: You cannot request a payout at this time
request.step1Desc: You submit your request with the desired amount
request.step2Desc: An administrator reviews your request (usually within 24-48h)
request.step3Desc: If approved, the payout is created to your Stripe account
request.step4Desc: Stripe processes the payout to your bank account (2-5 business days)

paymentsTab.title: Stripe Connect Configuration
paymentsTab.accountReady: Your account is set up and ready to receive payments
paymentsTab.warningDesc: To receive your payments, you must complete your Stripe Connect account setup. This secure process takes about 5 minutes.
paymentsTab.manageAccountDesc: Access your Stripe Connect space to manage your payments, transfers and bank information (IBAN).
paymentsTab.howToAddBank: How to add my bank account?
paymentsTab.bankStep1: Click the "Open Stripe Connect" button above
paymentsTab.bankStep2: Log in to your Stripe Connect space
paymentsTab.bankStep3: Add your IBAN and bank information in the dedicated section
paymentsTab.bankStep4: Your transfers will be automatically sent according to your configuration
paymentsTab.importantNote: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Important: Never use the classic Stripe Dashboard, always use the Stripe Connect link provided above.
paymentsTab.securityPeriodDesc: Payments are held for 7 days to protect against disputes
paymentsTab.commissionDesc: The platform charges a 10% commission on each booking
paymentsTab.paymentRequestDesc: After 7 days, you can request transfer in the "Earnings" tab of your dashboard
paymentsTab.receptionDesc: Funds are transferred to your Stripe account, then to your bank according to your configuration
